summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Stamped Glorious Short Hair Extensions Halo Wire Sercet Crown Synthetic Wavy Curly Brown Blonde Bayalage Hairpieces For Women Invisible (16 inch, 16H613)
Review Date: 2021/02/28
Store: Stamped Glorious
Average Rating: 2.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Stamped Glorious', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 7.05 x 1.69 inches; 6.74 Ounces'}
Review Text: The quality of this hair is great! No one could even tell there was a hairpiece in. The hair is nice and thick. It does advertise that heat products can be used on it. When trying to curl for tighter curls, it didn’t really hold well, but none the less the curls it came with have held up well.
Review Title: Wow! Can you even tell this is fake!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff
Review Date: 2021/04/09
Store: Beeager
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is such a cute idea/ makes for a cute display in my vanity room. The scrunchies are great quality and several color options for any outfit. I would recommend this to any fellow scrunchie lover!
Review Title: Just as advertised!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bold Men, Mens Hair Brush For Head and Beard, Thick and Thin Hair Types
Review Date: 2021/04/12
Store: BOLD MEN
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BOLD MEN', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 2.36 x 1.97 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '793611800557'}
Review Text: This brush is a decent option for a beard brush, but it is pretty soft bristled. It’s not a very dense brush. The bristles are kinda cheap looking but it has held up.
Review Title: Soft bristles
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Shakira Perfumes - Dance for Women - Long Lasting - Femenine, Charming and Modern Perfume - Fruity Floral Notes - Ideal for Day Wear - 1.7 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/06/11
Store: Shakira
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Shakira', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '50 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Dance', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Language': 'English', 'Product Dimensions': '2.64 x 2.05 x 5.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8411061823033'}
Review Text: I really love the smell of this scent. It’s a nice warm seductive smell. It stays around for a long period of time and I’m always so excited to spritz it on. It has a fun bottle and makes for cute display.
Review Title: Smells great!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Gel Beads Eye Mask, Cooling Eye Mask Reduce Puffy Dark Circles Migraines Headaches Stress Relief (Gel Eye Mask(Blue)+3D Sleep Mask)
Review Date: 2021/08/01
Store: CONSGIJI
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.66 x 4.37 x 1.22 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '046432534324'}
Review Text: Ultimately this site is a great option. The sleep mask helps greatly keeping sunlight out. I will say that the gel mask has a strong plastic smell to it which I do not enjoy. It actually makes it unbearable to wear so I’ve only been using the sleep mask. If the mask did not have a scent to it it would be great. The gel when frozen feels great around your eyes and helps relieve any puffiness or it’s just relaxing if I have a headache.
Review Title: Gel mask has a plastic smell
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Heatless Hair Rollers Curling Rod Headband No Heat Hair Curlers Curls Silk Curling Ribbon Headband Wave Formers Hair Curlers DIY Hair Styling Tools for Long Medium Hair
Review Date: 2022/03/27
Store: VOOA
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly, Straight', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Size': '3 Piece Set', 'Brand': 'VOOA', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.25 x 2.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '749652888061 749652887460'}
Review Text: I personally feel using a robe string is much easier than this method. I felt the foam in hard to manage / it’s awkward to Maneuver around. I could not sleep with this in.
Review Title: Hard to manage
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lash Lift Kit,Cuckoo Upgraded Eyelash Lift Kit,Eyelash Perm Kit,Professional Semi-Permanent Curling Perming Wave Suitable For Salon,Lash Lift
Review Date: 2022/03/27
Store: Cuckoo
Average Rating: 2.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '11.81 x 5.12 x 9.84 inches', 'Operation Mode': 'Manual', 'Product Dimensions': '11.81 x 5.12 x 9.84 inches; 7.87 Ounces'}
Review Text: This set is easy to use, but I don’t feel the results were the best!
Review Title: Easy to use
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Hair Products**: Strong interest in hair accessories, extensions, and styling tools; notable focus on quality and ease of use, as indicated by mixed ratings on hair tools and extensions.
- **Aesthetics and Display**: A preference for visually appealing items that also serve a functional purpose (e.g., scrunchie holders).
- **Fragrance Choices**: Enjoyment of long-lasting, feminine scents, emphasizing charm and warmth in preferences.
- **Health and Self-Care**: Interest in products that offer relaxation and stress relief (e.g., eye masks), but sensitivity to product odors.
- **Skepticism in Performance**: Disappointment with effectiveness and practicality in certain products (e.g., heatless curlers and lash kits).
- **Overall Ratings Variety**: Generally positive feedback for aesthetically pleasing items, while expectations for performance in utility products are less consistently met.

**Trends**:
- Favorable towards high-quality materials and designs.
- Varied experiences with functionality; more success observed with accessories than specialized beauty treatments.
- Strong appreciation for practical beauty and personal care items combined with a preference for charm and aesthetic appeal.

target_interaction.title: Very realistic!
target_interaction.text: For a wig newbie/ for fun wig wearer this wig looks very real. It was easy to put it on and stayed put!
target_interaction.title_meta: AISI BEAUTY Short Wavy Bob Wig with Bangs Shoulder Length Burgundy Synthetic Bob Curly Wigs for Women Natural Looking Heat Resistant Fiber Hair
